subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Louis Oosthuizen and Sam Hutsby shared the lead at the Andalucia Open while the defending champion Soren Kjeldsen had to contend with a nudist while playing a shot in the second round.
snippet: Louis Oosthuizen and Sam Hutsby shared the lead at the Andalucia Open while the defending champion Soren Kjeldsen had to contend with a nudist while playing a shot in the second round.
